message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been valued at $10,000. Considering its high quality and unique features, I would like to extend this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is a limited-time offer, so I hope you'll find it attractive.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the discount, but I'm looking to pay closer to $8,500.  This product is valuable to me, but I need to stay within my budget.  Let me know if you're open to that price.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. To accommodate your needs, I am willing to consider an offer of $9,000 for our premium product. This still represents a significant discount compared to its value, and I believe it will be a mutually beneficial arrangement.

Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway.  $9,000 is still a bit higher than I'd like to spend.  Would you consider $8,750?  This is a fair compromise that allows us both to find some common ground.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I appreciate your efforts to find a fair price. In light of your proposal, I am willing to negotiate further. I propose to offer our premium product for $8,900. This remains a generous discount and I hope it will meet your expectations.
